Class Player

java.lang.Object
  Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
HumanPlayer, RandomPlayer, SmartPlayer
public abstract class Player
extends Object

Abstract class Player focuses on its board, name, and color.

Version:
May 3, 2017
Author:
Alex Yu

n - the name of the player
